Guys, I have a problem... (help plz x) ) When I using movement of any IR parts in flight I have a black screen with an inscription in the console "look rotation viewing vector is zero". I have many installed mods, but I'm not sure that this could be a conflict with other modes (KJR not installed) What could it be?  

version 1.4.2

Hey, currently running 1.4.2 and using the versions of IR and the sequencer that work with that version. I can't however get the Sequencer window to show so I can't use it (The part is there but I cannot find a way to open the GUI for it, just have the option to lock/control from here). I've tried unistalling all other mods and using a fresh install to no avail.

Help would be appreciated as I really want to try my hand at building mechs!

Hello everyone. I come to you because I have a huge problem. I install IR and IR Sequencer. However the sequencer button does not appear ... 

-InfernalRobotics\_v3.0.0\_beta3\_p7\_for\_1.4.2 

-IRSequencer-1.0.3-Final 

Where can this problem come from please ?

(Google trad, i'm french)
